00067   class CommBuf {
00068   public:
00069 
00082     CommBuf(HeaderBuilder &hbuilder, uint32_t len) : ext_ptr(0) {
00083       len += hbuilder.header_length();
00084       data.set(new uint8_t [len], len, true);
00085       data_ptr = data.base;
00086       hbuilder.set_total_len(len);
00087       hbuilder.encode(&data_ptr);
00088     }
00089 
00103     CommBuf(HeaderBuilder &hbuilder, uint32_t len, StaticBuffer &buffer) : ext(buffer) {
00104       len += hbuilder.header_length();
00105       data.set(new uint8_t [len], len, true);
00106       data_ptr = data.base;
00107       hbuilder.set_total_len(len+buffer.size);
00108       hbuilder.encode(&data_ptr);
00109       ext_ptr = ext.base;
00110     }
00111 
00118     void reset_data_pointers() {
00119       HT_EXPECT((data_ptr - data.base) == (int)data.size, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00120       data_ptr = data.base;
00121       ext_ptr = ext.base;
00122     }
00123 
00127     void *get_data_ptr() { return data_ptr; }
00128 
00132     uint8_t **get_data_ptr_address() { return &data_ptr; }
00133 
00140     void *advance_data_ptr(size_t len) { data_ptr += len; return data_ptr; }
00141 
00148     void append_bool(bool bval) { Serialization::encode_bool(&data_ptr, bval); }
00149 
00156     void append_byte(uint8_t bval) { *data_ptr++ = bval; }
00157 
00165     void append_bytes(uint8_t *bytes, uint32_t len) {
00166       memcpy(data_ptr, bytes, len);
00167       data_ptr += len;
00168     }
00169

00179       Serialization::encode_str16(&data_ptr, str);
